002// Open Source Software; you can modify and/or share it under the terms of

004
005package edu.wpi.first.networktables;
006
007import edu.wpi.first.util.WPIUtilJNI;
008import java.util.HashMap;
009import java.util.Map;
010import java.util.concurrent.locks.Condition;
011import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock;
012import java.util.function.Consumer;
013
014/**
015 * Value change listener. This calls back to a callback function when a value change matching the
016 * specified mask occurs.
017 */
018public final class ValueListener implements AutoCloseable {
019  /**
020   * Create a listener for value changes on a subscriber.
021   *
022   * @param subscriber Subscriber
023   * @param eventMask Bitmask of ValueListenerFlags values
024   * @param listener Listener function
025   */
026  public ValueListener(Subscriber subscriber, int eventMask, Consumer<ValueNotification> listener) {
027    s_lock.lock();
028    try {
029      if (s_poller == 0) {
030        s_inst = subscriber.getTopic().getInstance();
031        s_poller = NetworkTablesJNI.createValueListenerPoller(s_inst.getHandle());
032        startThread();
033      }
034      m_handle =
035          NetworkTablesJNI.addPolledValueListener(s_poller, subscriber.getHandle(), eventMask);
036      s_listeners.put(m_handle, listener);
037    } finally {
038      s_lock.unlock();
039    }
040  }
041
042  /**
043   * Create a listener for value changes on a subscriber.
044   *
045   * @param subscriber Subscriber
046   * @param eventMask Bitmask of ValueListenerFlags values
047   * @param listener Listener function
048   */
049  public ValueListener(
050      MultiSubscriber subscriber, int eventMask, Consumer<ValueNotification> listener) {
051    s_lock.lock();
052    try {
053      if (s_poller == 0) {
054        s_inst = subscriber.getInstance();
055        s_poller = NetworkTablesJNI.createValueListenerPoller(s_inst.getHandle());
056        startThread();
057      }
058      m_handle =
059          NetworkTablesJNI.addPolledValueListener(s_poller, subscriber.getHandle(), eventMask);
060      s_listeners.put(m_handle, listener);
061    } finally {
062      s_lock.unlock();
063    }
064  }
065
066  /**
067   * Create a listener for value changes on an entry.
068   *
069   * @param entry Entry
070   * @param eventMask Bitmask of ValueListenerFlags values
071   * @param listener Listener function
072   */
073  public ValueListener(
074      NetworkTableEntry entry, int eventMask, Consumer<ValueNotification> listener) {
075    s_lock.lock();
076    try {
077      if (s_poller == 0) {
078        s_inst = entry.getInstance();
079        s_poller = NetworkTablesJNI.createValueListenerPoller(s_inst.getHandle());
080        startThread();
081      }
082      m_handle = NetworkTablesJNI.addPolledValueListener(s_poller, entry.getHandle(), eventMask);
083      s_listeners.put(m_handle, listener);
084    } finally {
085      s_lock.unlock();
086    }
087  }
088
089  @Override
090  public synchronized void close() {
091    if (m_handle != 0) {
092      s_lock.lock();
093      try {
094        s_listeners.remove(m_handle);
095      } finally {
096        s_lock.unlock();
097      }
098      NetworkTablesJNI.removeValueListener(m_handle);
099      m_handle = 0;
100    }
101  }
102
103  /**
104   * Determines if the native handle is valid.
105   *
106   * @return True if the native handle is valid, false otherwise.
107   */
108  public boolean isValid() {
109    return m_handle != 0;
110  }
111
112  /**
113   * Gets the native handle.
114   *
115   * @return Native handle
116   */
117  public int getHandle() {
118    return m_handle;
119  }
120
121  private int m_handle;
122
123  private static final ReentrantLock s_lock = new ReentrantLock();
124  private static final Map<Integer, Consumer<ValueNotification>> s_listeners = new HashMap<>();
125  private static Thread s_thread;
126  private static NetworkTableInstance s_inst;
127  private static int s_poller;
128  private static boolean s_waitQueue;
129  private static final Condition s_waitQueueCond = s_lock.newCondition();
130
131  private static void startThread() {
132    s_thread =
133        new Thread(
134            () -> {
135              boolean wasInterrupted = false;
136              while (!Thread.interrupted()) {
137                try {
138                  WPIUtilJNI.waitForObject(s_poller);
139                } catch (InterruptedException ex) {
140                  s_lock.lock();
141                  try {
142                    if (s_waitQueue) {
143                      s_waitQueue = false;
144                      s_waitQueueCond.signalAll();
145                      continue;
146                    }
147                  } finally {
148                    s_lock.unlock();
149                  }
150                  Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
151                  // don't try to destroy poller, as its handle is likely no longer valid
152                  wasInterrupted = true;
153                  break;
154                }
155                for (ValueNotification event :
156                    NetworkTablesJNI.readValueListenerQueue(s_inst, s_poller)) {
157                  Consumer<ValueNotification> listener;
158                  s_lock.lock();
159                  try {
160                    listener = s_listeners.get(event.listener);
161                  } finally {
162                    s_lock.unlock();
163                  }
164                  if (listener != null) {
165                    try {
166                      listener.accept(event);
167                    } catch (Throwable throwable) {
168                      System.err.println(
169                          "Unhandled exception during listener callback: " + throwable.toString());
170                      throwable.printStackTrace();
171                    }
172                  }
173                }
174              }
175              s_lock.lock();
176              try {
177                if (!wasInterrupted) {
178                  NetworkTablesJNI.destroyValueListenerPoller(s_poller);
179                }
180                s_poller = 0;
181              } finally {
182                s_lock.unlock();
183              }
184            },
185            "ValueListener");
186    s_thread.setDaemon(true);
187    s_thread.start();
188  }
189}
